abstract: Duke University, Durham, NC Ph.D. in Economics, in progress, exp. 2018 Fields: Urban Economics, Public Economics Field Paper: “House Prices and Crime Risk: Evidence from the United Kingdom” Dissertation Prospectus: “The New Markets Tax Credit and Local Economic Outcomes” Committee: Christopher Timmins, Patrick Bayer, Peter Arcidiacono, Juan Carlos Suarez Serrato M.A. in Economics, 2014 Brown University, Providence, RI B.S. in Applied Math and Economics, 2012 Honors: Magna Cum Laude, Departmental Honors Thesis: “School Assignment and Housing Values: Evidence from Wake County, North Carolina” Awards: Royce Sport and Society Fellow, Academic All-American
